data.author: Aditya Tripathi
data.description: Tutorial on what can be done through the slides

divs.text: A host will guide this game, which takes a 60-minute session You will be divided into small groups There will be themed trivia or custom questions The host asks one question at a time, and teams write down their answers The host calls out the correct answers and then teams tally up their points

A host will guide this game, which takes a 60-minute session You will be divided into small groups There will be themed trivia or custom questions The host asks one question at a time, and teams write down their answers The host calls out the correct answers and then teams tally up their points

renderFunctions.functionBody: return function getAnswer(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; return answer + " - Selected Category"; }
return function getAnswer(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; return answer + " - Category"; }

return function getQuestion(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; const questions = { 'Who was the very first American Idol winner?': 'MUSIC', 'What is the Sensing City technology called?': 'TECHNOLOGY', 'Who was the first Emperor of Rome?': 'HISTORY', 'What film was released in 2021 and was directed by Denis Villeneuve?': 'MOVIES' }; return Object.keys(questions).find(key => questions[key] === answer) || 'Select the category to get a question'; }

return function getQuestion(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; const questions = { 'Who was the very first American Idol winner?': 'MUSIC', 'What is the Sensing City technology called?': 'TECHNOLOGY', 'Who was the first Emperor of Rome?': 'HISTORY', 'What film was released in 2021 and was directed by Denis Villeneuve?': 'MOVIES' }; return Object.keys(questions).find(key => questions[key] === answer) || 'Select the category to get a question'; }

return function getOptions(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; const options = { 'MUSIC': ['Kelly Clarkson'], 'TECHNOLOGY': ['Cense'], 'HISTORY': ['Augustus'], 'MOVIES': ['Dune'] }; return options[answer] || []; }

return function getOptions(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; const options = { 'MUSIC': [ 'Carrie Underwood'], 'TECHNOLOGY': ['SenseCity'], 'HISTORY': ['Julius Caesar'], 'MOVIES': ['Blade Runner 2049'] }; return options[answer] || []; }

return function getOptions(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; const options = { 'MUSIC': ['Alan Jackson'], 'TECHNOLOGY': ['New York City'], 'HISTORY': ['Hannibal Barca'], 'MOVIES': ['The Matrix'] }; return options[answer] || []; }

return function getOptions(data) { const answer = data['ANSWER']; const options = { 'MUSIC': ['Kanye West'], 'TECHNOLOGY': ['New Haven'], 'HISTORY': ['Joan of Arc'], 'MOVIES': ['The Godfather'] }; return options[answer] || []; }
